words.translation: Ta Seem Meem
These|(are the) Verses|(of) the Book|clear

translations.1: Qaala haazihee naaqatul lahaa shirbunw walakum shirbu yawmim ma'loom
translations.2: Qala hathihi naqatun laha shirbun walakum shirbu yawmin maAAloomin

words.translation: And (do) not|touch her|with harm|lest seize you|(the) punishment|(of) a Day|Great

translations.2: Wala tamassooha bisooin fayakhuthakum AAathabu yawmin AAatheemin

words.translation: But they hamstrung her|then they became|regretful
So seized them|the punishment|Indeed|in|that|surely is a sign|but not|are|most of them|believers

translations.1: Fa-akhazahumul 'azaab; inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
translations.2: Faakhathahumu alAAathabu inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineena

Denied|(the) people|(of) Lut|the Messengers
When|said|to them|their brother|Lut|Will not|you fear (Allah)

translations.1: Iz qaala lahum akhoohum Lootun alaa tattaqoon
translations.2: Ith qala lahum akhoohum lootun ala tattaqoona

words.translation: Indeed I am|to you|a Messenger|trustworthy
So fear|Allah|and obey me
And not|I ask you|for it|any|payment|Not|(is) my payment|except|from|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
translations.2: Wama asalukum AAalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameena

words.translation: Do you approach|the males|among|the worlds
And you leave|what|created|for you|your Lord|of|your mates|Nay|you|(are) a people|transgressing

translations.1: Wa-tazaroona maa khalaqa lakum Rabbukum min azwaajikum; bal antum qawmun 'aadoon
translations.2: Watatharoona ma khalaqa lakum rabbukum min azwajikum bal antum qawmun AAadoona

words.translation: They said|If|not|you desist|O Lut!|Surely you will be|of|the ones driven out

translations.1: Qaloo la'il lam tantahi yaa-Lootu latakoonanna minal mukhrajeen
translations.2: Qaloo lain lam tantahi ya lootu latakoonanna mina almukhrajeena

words.translation: He said|Indeed I am|(of) your deed|of|those who detest
My Lord!|Save me|and my family|from what|they do
So We saved him|and his family|all
Except|an old woman|(was) among|those who remained behind
Then|We destroyed|the others
And We rained|upon them|a rain|and evil was|(was) the rain|(on) those who were warned

translations.2: Waamtarna AAalayhim mataran fasaa mataru almunthareena

translations.1: Inna fee zaalika la-Aayah; Wa-maa kaana aksaruhum mu'mineen
translations.2: Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineena

Denied|(the) companions|(of the) Wood|the Messengers

translations.1: Iz qaala lahum Shu'aybun alaa tattaqoon
translations.2: Ith qala lahum shuAAaybun ala tattaqoona

And not|I ask (of) you|for it|any|payment|Not|(is) my payment|except|from|(the) Lord|(of) the worlds

translations.1: Wa-maaa as'alukum 'alaihi min ajrin in ajriya illaa 'alaa Rabbil 'aalameen
translations.2: Wama asalukum AAalayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa AAala rabbi alAAalameena

words.translation: Give full|measure|and (do) not|be|of|those who cause loss

translations.1: Awful kaila Wa-laa takoonoo minal mukhsireen
translations.2: Awfoo alkayla wala takoonoo mina almukhsireena

words.translation: And weigh|with a balance|[the] even
And (do) not|deprive|people|(of) their things|and (do) not|commit evil|in|the earth|spreading corruption

translations.1: Wa-laa tabkhasun naasa ashyaaa-'ahum Wa-laa ta'saw fil ardi mufsideen
translations.2: Wala tabkhasoo alnnasa ashyaahum wala taAAthaw fee alardi mufsideena

words.translation: And fear|the One Who|created you|and the generations|the former

And not|you|(are) except|a man|like us|and indeed|we think you|surely (are) of|the liars

translations.1: Wa-maaa anta illaa basharum mislunaa Wa-in nazunnuka laminal kaazibeen
translations.2: Wama anta illa basharun mithluna wain nathunnuka lamina alkathibeena

translations.1: Fa-asqit 'alainaa kisafam minas samaaa'i in kunta minas saadiqeen
translations.2: Faasqit AAalayna kisafan mina alssamai in kunta mina alssadiqeena

But they denied him|so seized them|(the) punishment|(of the) day|(of) the shadow|Indeed it|was|(the) punishment|(of) a Day|Great

translations.1: Fakazzaboohu fa-akhazahum 'azaabu Yawmiz zullah; innahoo kaana 'azaaba Yawmin 'Azeem

translations.2: Inna fee thalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mumineena

words.translation: And indeed|your Lord|surely He|(is) the All-Mighty|the Most Merciful
And indeed it|surely is a Revelation|(of the) Lord|(of) the worlds
Has brought it down|Has brought it down|the Spirit|[the] Trustworthy
Upon|your heart|that you may be|of|the warners
In language|Arabic|clear
And indeed it|surely (is) in|(the) Scriptures|(of) the former (people)
Is it not|Is it not|to them|a sign|that|know it|(the) scholars|(of the) Children|(of) Israel

translations.1: Awalam yakul lahum Aayatan ai ya'lamahoo 'ulamaaa'u Baneee Israaa'eel

And he (had) recited it|to them|not|they would|in it|(be) believers

translations.2: Faqaraahu AAalayhim ma kanoo bihi mumineena

words.translation: Thus|We have inserted it|into|(the) hearts|(of) the criminals
Not|they will believe|in it|until|they see|the punishment|[the] painful

translations.1: Laa yu'minoona bihee hattaa yarawul 'azaabal aleem
translations.2: La yuminoona bihi hatta yarawoo alAAathaba alaleema

So is it for Our punishment|they wish to hasten
Then have you seen|if|We let them enjoy|(for) years
Then|comes to them|what|they were|promised
Not|(will) avail|them|what|enjoyment they were given|enjoyment they were given

translations.2: Ma aghna AAanhum ma kanoo yumattaAAoona

words.translation: And not|We destroyed|any|town|but|it had|warners

translations.2: Wama ahlakna min qaryatin illa laha munthiroona

words.translation: (To) remind|and not|We are|unjust
And not|have brought it down|have brought it down|the devils
And not|(it) suits|[for] them|and not|they are able
Indeed they|from|the hearing|(are) surely banished
So (do) not|invoke|with|Allah|god|another|lest you be|of|those punished

translations.1: Falaa tad'u ma'al laahi ilaahan aakhara fatakoona minal mu'azzabeen
translations.2: Fala tadAAu maAAa Allahi ilahan akhara fatakoona mina almuAAaththabeena

And lower|your wing|to (those) who|follow you|of|the believers

translations.1: Wakhfid janaahaka limanit taba-'aka minal mu'mineen
translations.2: Waikhfid janahaka limani ittabaAAaka mina almumineena

words.translation: Then if|they disobey you|then say|Indeed I am|innocent|of what|you do

The One Who|sees you|when|you stand up
And your movements|among|those who prostrate
Indeed He|He|(is) the All-Hearer|the All-Knower
Shall|I inform you|upon|whom|descend|the devils

translations.2: Hal onabbiokum AAala man tanazzalu alshshayateenu

And the poets|follow them|the deviators
Do not|you see|that they|in|every|valley|[they] roam

translations.2: Alam tara annahum fee kulli wadin yaheemoona
